metaDescription: Personal website of Be単at Espi単a, software engineer
aboutMe: Hi, I'm Be単at Espi単a, Software engineer born on March 25, 1990 in a fishing village named Santurtzi (Basque Country). I really love web development and life-long learner. I am fan of BDD methodology, I really like the green color of tests, obsessed of clean code and the good Software architectures. Today, I work in LIN3S, exploring DDD and BEM techniques.
skills: PHP and JavaScript. Developing web apps with Symfony and Backbone.js. Somemtimes, Node.js could be a good alternative. Interesting in Sass improving CSS3 code. MySQL and MongoDB as databases. Obsessed with tests coverage, modular architectures and clean code.
postgraduate: Postgraduate in Software solutions for the Internet
lin3sDescription: Technical analysis and development. LIN3S, web development, marketing online and web analytic. Technologies: PHP, Wordpress, Twig, HTML5, MySQL, CSS3, Sass, JavaScript, Behat, PHPSpec, Git, Capistrano, Apache.
wlinguaDescription: Technical analysis and development of Wlingua. Technologies: PHP, Symfony2, Twig, HTML5, MySQL, Doctrine, CSS3, Sass, JavaScript, Dojo, PHPSpec, Vagrant, Git. Bad experience, I don't recommend working there.
boletusDescription: Technical analysis and development of Boletus, webapp of geolocation offers. Technologies: Symfony2, PHP, Twig, HTML5, Sphinx, MongoDB, MySQL, Doctrine, CSS3, Sass, JavaScript, jQuery, PHPSpec, Behat, Vagrant, Git.
bosoDescription: Technical analysis and development of Alotofus. Technologies: Symfony2, PHP, Twig, HTML5, MySQL, Doctrine, CSS3, Sass, Compass, JavaScript, CoffeeScript, jQuery, BackBone.js, PHPSpec, Behat, Vagrant, Git, Jenkins, Scrum.
serikatDescription: Technical Analysis and programming for the city of Bilbao (Cimubisa). Technologies: Java, SQL Server, JSP, Ajax, JavaScript, jQuery, Struts, JAXB, CSS, JSTL, Maven, Tomcat, XSD, XML Schema.
